display.title: Insane Batteries
description: &&o&&7"250,000,000 EU in a Battery? That's 25 minutes of Power when drained constantly."
The &&aLapotronic Energy Orb&&r should be the beginning of the end of your energy storage struggles.
This form of Energy Storage is perfect if your Power Generation is inconsistent, or if you need to buffer large amounts due to the nature of &&3Large Turbines&&r.
Such a boost in power does not come cheap. Each &&dLapotronic Energy Orb&&r is worth &&a8 Lapotron Crystals&&r.
